name: Brave cow
description:
Game introduction

Players need to control a jet fighter to fly on terrain full of obstacles. When the aircraft accidentally hits these obstacles, it will be destroyed. All players need to do is to control the plane to move left and right, and go through circles as much as possible to get higher scores!
The built-in store in the game can be purchased through the points obtained.
The movie part does not need to be unlocked and all can be watched directly, and all the female characters in it can perform operations such as breast-exposing.
